name: warsawjs-workshop-31-calendar-server
description: Express server serving client app and api
author: G3F4

scripts.client:build: rm -rf public && tar -zxvf client-package.tar.gz && mv build public
scripts.dev: yarn run client:build && nodemon -r dotenv/config index.js
scripts.start: yarn run client:build && node -r dotenv/config index.js
